value.name: Man to serve 8 years in prison for Waterville drive-by shooting that injured 7-year-old girl
value.description: The father of victim Emahleeah Frost says his daughter, 7 years-old when she was shot while in her bedroom, may suffer consequences of the shooting for the rest of her life.

value.name: Man gets 8 years for drive-by shooting in Waterville that injured a young girl
value.description: A Maine man was sentenced to eight years in prison for firing shots into a house that injured a 7-year-old girl in Waterville.
